item.title: Premium Problem
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:14, topic:165931”]I could be wrong, don’t the cases represent a playerRight number?

-Doesn’t seem like it.

Btw Itzkyle for those commands you could of used ‘Ors’.

EDIT:

Oh and are you selling the premium or is everyone premium? If you want to make everyone premium change the last false to true.[/quote]

i know i didnt make i was in a rush

item.title: Premium Problem
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“Play For Keeps, post:9, topic:165931”]who would I do that??? I only have one number?? show me an example for this command, so that only mods,admins,and owners can do it.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modarea") && playerRights > 0) { teleportToX = 2533; teleportToY = 3169; }
How would I make that so that playerights 1-3 can only use it[/quote]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“modarea”) && playerRights == 3)
{
teleportToX = 2533;
teleportToY = 3169;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“modarea”) && playerRights == 2)
{
teleportToX = 2533;
teleportToY = 3169;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“modarea”) && playerRights == 1)
{
teleportToX = 2533;
teleportToY = 3169;
}

these better ways this is just a fast one

Read full topic

item.title: Premium Problem
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

How I make this dude premium on my dodian based server??

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3248 character-posy = 9367 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0

Client.java

switch (playerRights) { case 20: //root admin premium = true; break; case 3: //regular admin premium = true; break; case 2: //global mod premium = true; break; case 1: //player moderator premium = true; break; case 4: //just premium premium = true; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = false; //false; break; }

Read full topic
